summary: Another proud Scottish clan in Skyrim :)
descriptionHtml:
Crests Mod.

put simple, i take requests from member on the Nexus, and turn their Crest, Coat of Arms, Logo or Clan Insignia and texture a set of armor off of it, if you want yours done, send me a PM with a link to your Crest, and which armor you want replaced. dont forget to endorse the files if you like them ;)

anyway, this Version of the Crests Mod covers the MacGregor Clan, and the textures replace those of Riften with my Versions. this was made by request and i hope you all enjoy it!

Other Crest Mods:

Crests Mod Whiterun Callaghan
Crests Mod Solitude Bauer
Crests Mod Markarth Almeida
Crests Mod Dawnstar Maclean
author: Callaghan04
